AMECard.Name: Concept detection
AMECard.Definition: Determine if a video segment represents a specified/one from a list of specified concept class(es). A concept is visually represented by the content, but not a particular object. Examples are day/night, indoor/outdoor, rural, ... Also includes basic actions such as person walking, person greeting other person.

Input.Name: ConceptModelToUse
Input.Definition: If applicable, visual model to use for detection.

Output.Name: DetectedConcepts
Output.Comment: Per concept class, a list of time segments
